thread.section_title: Lauryn Rose Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lauryn Rose | laurynrose.com
thread.title: Carmel O'Halloran
thread.title_full: Lauryn Rose reviewed by Carmel O'Halloran

author: Carmel O'Halloran
title: Carmel O'Halloran
text: I received the gift i purchased in the most beautiful packaging i have ever seen. The gift is for my daughter who lives in New Zealand and is expecting her first baby, so i wanted a special gift to send to her. I picked the silver charm bracelet with a little boy charm it is a most beautiful piece and superb quality I have no doubt that she will love it . Lauryn Rose is unique in every way and I hope to buy many of their pieces in the future.Their support of Laura Lynn Childrens Hospice is a charity close to my heart and added to my reasons for buying from their company .
